rlu.foundation.gui
Class TextAreaWithUndo

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.text.JTextComponent
                  javax.swing.JTextArea
                      rlu.foundation.gui.TextAreaWithUndo
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable
public class TextAreaWithUndo
extends javax.swing.JTextArea

Extends the swing text area with local undo functionality. Note, that the undo manager is reset whenever the method setText(String) is called.

Author:
R. Lunde
See Also:
Serialized Form
